title: Magic Hat
summaries: The Magic Hat is an armor item that can be equipped in the helmet slot. It increases the player's magic damage and magic critical strike chance by (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 6% / (Old-gen console version) 7% each, and grants 2 additional defense. It is purchased from the Traveling Merchant for 3 GC.

The Magic Hat is part of the <linked>Wizard set</linked>, which further consists of a <linked>Mystic Robe</linked> or any gem-augmented <linked>Robe</linked>. It provides a <linked>set bonus</linked> of +60 <linked>mana</linked>. The <linked>Wizard Hat</linked> is an alternative for the helmet slot.
